content: this is a summary of a legal case involving a dispute over coowned property between two parties the court of appeal has ruled that the plaintiff is entitled to receive 74664 eur to cover their costs which the defendant is responsible for paying the court also determined that the plaintiff has a 55 share in the coowned property while the defendant has a 45 share the court dismissed certain claims and counterclaims made by both parties the court considered various factors such as income difference and contributions to the household in determining the division of property the court also addressed the issue of a joint loan taken during the marriage and determined that the defendant failed to prove that the loan was not taken jointly the court ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff a sum of 853477 eur the court also dismissed certain claims related to movable property and ordered the plaintiff to pay the defendants legal costs the defendant appealed the judgment but the court of appeal upheld the decision of the lower court and ordered the appellant to bear the costs of the appeal the judgment is final and enforceable

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani I Cp 2030/2021, 31. 5. 2022
